alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Cuyahoga County through 145 PM EDT... At 112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cleveland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Warrensville Heights, Highland Hills, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights, South Euclid, Parma Heights, Brook Park, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland, Middleburg Heights, Lyndhurst, University Heights and Bedford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
